data.title: Hollywood & Media Deaths In 2022: Photo Gallery
data.meta_description: Click through a photo gallery of entertainment and media professionals who died in 2022.

A New Pope Is Elected In The Vatican

VATICAN CITY, VATICAN – APRIL 19: Newly elected Pope Benedict XVI appears on the central balcony of St Peter’s Basilica on April 19, 2005 in Vatican City.
